---
title: "製作路徑"
output: html_document
---

##for迴圈
```{r}
num=sample(c(1:20),10)
v=c()
for (i in 0:9){
  aa=paste("e//",i,"-",1:num[i+1],".txt",sep="")
  v=c(v,aa)
}
v
proc.time()
```
##向量法
```{r}
sss=function(i){
  num=num
  aa=paste("e//",i,"-",1:num[i+1],".txt",sep="")
  return(aa)
}
p=lapply(0:9,FUN=sss)
p=do.call("c",p)
p
proc.time()
```
